title: Cured mackerel with pickled vegetables and sweet cured gooseberries
description: The vibrant vegetables provide a sharp contrast to the rich and oily flesh of the mackerel. A summery supper for two.
ingredients: 1 carrot, peeled, cut lengthways and sliced thinly on an angle
½ cauliflower head, cut into small florets
1 courgette, cut lengthways and sliced thinly on an angle
